Package cs2030.simulator

Class SelfCheckoutServer

java.lang.Object
cs2030.simulator.Server
cs2030.simulator.SelfCheckoutServer
public class SelfCheckoutServer
extends Server
SelfCheckoutServer's job is to serve, reject, finish serving customers. Works together with SelfCheckoutServerManager which manages the queue.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private SelfCheckoutServerManager manager
    manager keeps tracking of waiting customers, all SelfCheckoutServers use the same manager.

    Fields inherited from class cs2030.simulator.Server

    id, nextAvail

  • Method Details

    • canServe

      public int canServe​(double time)
      Determines whether that Customer should be served, wait or leave. Leave returns -1, wait returns 0, serve returns 1.
      Specified by:
      canServe in class Server
      Parameters:
      time - Arrival time of customer.
      Returns:
      Integer signalling availability of server.

    • updateServe

      public SelfCheckoutServer updateServe​(double time)
      Updates server to Served.
      Specified by:
      updateServe in class Server
      Parameters:
      time - Time to update to.
      Returns:
      A new server with updated next available time and that it accepts waiting customers. //

    • updateWait

      public Server updateWait​(Customer customer)
      Updates common customer queue of server.
      Specified by:
      updateWait in class Server
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Server with updated manager.

    • getCustomer

      public java.util.Optional<Customer> getCustomer()
      Polls out a customer from queue, requests for manager.
      Specified by:
      getCustomer in class Server
      Returns:
      An optional that could contain the customer that was at the front of the queue.

    • getRest

      public boolean getRest​(double prob)
      Indicates if server wants to rest.
      Specified by:
      getRest in class Server
      Parameters:
      prob - A double created from random number generator.
      Returns:
      A boolean always returning false as self-check does not need to rest.
